```{r}
exchange_rate <- read.csv("/Users/CDUNK41/Desktop/USmarkets_data.csv")

str(exchange_rate)

library(psych)

sample_exchange <- exchange_rate[1:400, ]
sample_exchange_test <- exchange_rate[401:600, ]

library(Cubist)

exchange_model <- cubist(sample_exchange[-9], sample_exchange$Soybeans)

exchange_model

summary(exchange_model)

model_pred <- predict(exchange_model, sample_exchange_test)

cor(sample_exchange_test$Soybeans, model_pred)

```
